name: Weather App
role: I was the sole developer and designer of this project. Every asset on this project except for the animated weather icons was created from scratch
difficulties: I wanted to create an app that would take your current geolocation and present the current and weekly forecast to the user easily through visual and readable information
solution: I decided to create everything from scratch to allow for flexibility and responsiveness. I went with a space like design to represent stars and clouds.

name: Socket.IO Chat System
role: I was the sole developer and designer of this project. It is a live messaging service that will take in a name and allow users to message eachother instantaneously.
difficulties: The difficulty of this project was having the chat know which user sends a message and assigning it to that user
